00010         XmlConfig::XmlConfig( const std::string& file_name )
00011     : m_fileName(file_name), m_xmlContext(NULL), m_parsedDoc(NULL), m_loaded(false), m_lastChangeTime(0) {
00012 
00013                 MT_LOGINIT(XmlConfig);
00014                 m_errorBuf = new char[0x10000];
00015                 m_errorBuf[0] = 0;
00016                 init();

00020         XmlConfig::XmlConfig( const char* file_content )
00021     : m_xmlContext(NULL), m_parsedDoc(NULL), m_loaded(false), m_lastChangeTime(0) {
00022 
00023                 MT_LOGINIT(XmlConfig);
00024                 m_errorBuf = new char[0x10000];
00025                 m_errorBuf[0] = 0;
00026                 init();
00027                 parse(file_content);

00030         XmlConfig::XmlConfig( const XmlConfig& xcfg, const std::string& xpath )
00031                 : m_xmlContext(NULL), m_parsedDoc(NULL), m_loaded(false), m_lastChangeTime(0) {
00032 
00033                 MT_LOGINIT(XmlConfig);
00034                 m_lastChangeTime = xcfg.m_lastChangeTime;
00035                 m_errorBuf = new char[0x10000];
00036                 m_errorBuf[0] = 0;
00037                 init();
00038                 if (!xcfg.m_parsedDoc) {
00039                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to initialize XmlConfig: empty source document");
00040                 }
00041                 xmlXPathContextPtr ctx = xmlXPathNewContext(xcfg.m_parsedDoc);
00042                 if (ctx == NULL) {
00043                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to initialize XPath context");
00044                 }
00045                 ctx->node = xcfg.m_parsedDoc->children;
00046                 xmlXPathObjectPtr obj = xmlXPathEvalExpression((const xmlChar*)xpath.c_str(), ctx);
00047                 if (obj == NULL) {
00048                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to initialize XmlConfig: Failed to parse XPath " << xpath);
00049                 }
00050                 if (obj->nodesetval &&
00051                                 obj->nodesetval->nodeNr >= 1 &&
00052                                 obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[0]) {
00053                         m_parsedDoc = xmlNewDoc((const xmlChar*)"1.0");
00054                         // 1 - do a recursive copy (properties, namespaces and children when applicable)
00055                         m_parsedDoc->children = xmlCopyNode(obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[0], 1);
00056                         m_loaded = true;
00057                 } else {
00058                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to initialize XmlConfig: no nodes found: xpath " << xpath);
00059                 }
00060     xmlXPathFreeObject(obj);
00061     xmlXPathFreeContext(ctx);
00062         }

00064         XmlConfig::XmlConfig( const XmlConfig& cfg ) {
00065                 MT_LOGINIT(XmlConfig);
00066                 m_lastChangeTime = cfg.m_lastChangeTime;
00067                 m_errorBuf = new char[0x10000];
00068                 m_errorBuf[0] = 0;
00069                 m_fileName = cfg.m_fileName;
00070                 m_xmlContext = NULL;
00071                 if (cfg.m_parsedDoc) {
00072                         m_parsedDoc = xmlCopyDoc(cfg.m_parsedDoc, 1);
00073                 } else {
00074                         m_parsedDoc = NULL;
00075                 }
00076                 m_loaded = cfg.m_loaded;
00077         }

00079         XmlConfig::XmlConfig(const xmlNode* root, time_t last_change_time) : m_xmlContext(NULL), m_parsedDoc(NULL),
00080                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          m_loaded(false), m_lastChangeTime(last_change_time){
00081 
00082                 MT_LOGINIT(XmlConfig);
00083                 m_errorBuf = new char[0x10000];
00084                 m_errorBuf[0] = 0;
00085                 init();
00086                 m_parsedDoc = xmlNewDoc((const xmlChar*)"1.0");
00087                 // 1 - do a recursive copy (properties, namespaces and children when applicable)
00088                 m_parsedDoc->children = xmlCopyNode((xmlNode*)root, 1);
00089                 m_loaded = true;
00090         }

00092         XmlConfig::~XmlConfig() {
00093                 delete[] m_errorBuf;
00094                 if (m_xmlContext) {
00095                         xmlFreeParserCtxt(m_xmlContext);
00096                 }
00097                 if (m_parsedDoc) {
00098                         xmlFreeDoc(m_parsedDoc);
00099                 }
00100         }

00102         void XmlConfig::reload( const char* new_file_name ) {
00103                 if( 0 != new_file_name ){
00104                         m_fileName = new_file_name;
00105                 }
00106                 load();

00109         void XmlConfig::init() {
00110                 m_xmlContext = xmlNewParserCtxt();
00111                 if (m_xmlContext == NULL) {
00112                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to initialize XML parser context");
00113                 }
00114         }

00116         void XmlConfig::xmlErrorHandler(void *ctxt, const char* msg, ...) {
00117                 MT_LOGINIT_STATIC(XmlConfig);
00118                 XmlConfig* xcfg = (XmlConfig*)ctxt;
00119                 char* buf = xcfg->m_errorBuf;
00120                 va_list args;
00121                 va_start(args, msg);
00122                 vsprintf(&buf[strlen(buf)], msg, args);
00123 
00124                 std::string sbuf(buf);
00125                 std::string::size_type pos;
00126                 if ((pos = sbuf.find(std::string("\n"))) != std::string::npos) {
00127                         sbuf = sbuf.erase(pos, 1);
00128                         MT_LOGWARNING(sbuf);
00129                         buf[0] = 0;
00130                 }
00131                 va_end(args);
00132         }

00134         void XmlConfig::load(){
00135                 xmlSetGenericErrorFunc(this, xmlErrorHandler);
00136                 m_parsedDoc = xmlCtxtReadFile(m_xmlContext, m_fileName.c_str(),
00137                                                                                                                                         NULL, XML_PARSE_RECOVER);
00138                 if (m_parsedDoc == NULL) {
00139                         MT_LOGERROR("Failed to parse XML from " << m_fileName);
00140                         m_loaded = false;
00141                         return;
00142                 }
00143                 setModificationTime();
00144 
00145                 m_loaded = true;
00146                 return;
00147         }

00149         void XmlConfig::parse(const char* content) {
00150                 MT_LOGINFO("Getting configuration from a string");
00151                 xmlSetGenericErrorFunc(this, xmlErrorHandler);
00152                 m_parsedDoc = xmlCtxtReadDoc(m_xmlContext, (const xmlChar*)content,
00153                                                                                                                                  "", NULL, XML_PARSE_RECOVER);
00154                 if (m_parsedDoc == NULL) {
00155                         MT_LOGERROR("Failed to parse XML from " << m_fileName);
00156                         m_loaded = false;
00157                         return;
00158                 }
00159                 MT_LOGINFO("Configuration successfully loaded");
00160 
00161                 m_loaded = true;
00162                 return;
00163         }

00165         std::string XmlConfig::get(const std::string& a, const std::string& b) const {
00166                 std::string value;
00167                 std::string xpath;
00168                 if(a=="") xpath="@"+b;
00169                 if(b=="") xpath=a;
00170                 if(a!="" && b!="") xpath=a+"/@"+b;
00171                 if(a=="" && b=="") {
00172                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to get attribute '" << b << "' from section '" << a << "'");
00173                 }
00174 
00175                 getValue(xpath, value);
00176                 return value;
00177         }

00180                 return get("", b);
00181         }

00183         std::string XmlConfig::getMandatory(const std::string& b) const {
00184                 std::string value = get("", b);
00185                 if(value.empty())
00186                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlExceptionNoMandatoryParamter, "No parameter '" << b << "'");
00187                 return value;
00188         }

00190         void XmlConfig::put(const std::string& a, const std::string& b,  const std::string& c) {
00191                 std::string xpath;
00192 
00193                 if(a.empty())
00194                         xpath="@"+b;
00195 
00196                 if(b.empty())
00197                         xpath = a;
00198 
00199                 if(!a.empty() && !b.empty())
00200                         xpath = a + "/@" + b;
00201 
00202                 if(a.empty() && b.empty())
00203                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to set attribute '" << b << "' from section '" << a << "'");
00204 
00205                 setValue(xpath, c);
00206         }

00209                 put("", b, c);
00210         }

00221         int32_t XmlConfig::getValue(const std::string& xpath, std::string& value ) const {
00222                 if (!m_parsedDoc) {
00223                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to get value: empty document");
00224                 }
00225                 xmlXPathContextPtr ctx = xmlXPathNewContext(m_parsedDoc);
00226                 if(!ctx){
00227                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to initialize XPath context");
00228                 }
00229                 ctx->node = m_parsedDoc->children;
00230                 xmlXPathObjectPtr obj = xmlXPathEvalExpression((const xmlChar*)xpath.c_str(), ctx);
00231                 if(!obj) {
00232                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to parse XPath " << xpath);
00233                 }
00234                 if (obj->nodesetval &&
00235                                 obj->nodesetval->nodeNr >= 1 &&
00236                                 obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[0] &&
00237                                 obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[0]->type == XML_ATTRIBUTE_NODE &&
00238                                 obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[0]->children) {
00239                         value = std::string((const char*)obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[0]->children->content);
00240                 }
00241 
00242                 xmlXPathFreeObject(obj);
00243                 xmlXPathFreeContext(ctx);
00244                 return 0;
00245         }

00247         int32_t XmlConfig::setValue( const std::string& xpath, const std::string& value ) {
00248                 if (!m_parsedDoc) {
00249                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to get value: empty document");
00250                 }
00251                 xmlXPathContextPtr ctx = xmlXPathNewContext(m_parsedDoc);
00252                 if (ctx == NULL) {
00253                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to initialize XPath context");
00254                 }
00255                 ctx->node = m_parsedDoc->children;
00256                 xmlXPathObjectPtr obj = xmlXPathEvalExpression((const xmlChar*)xpath.c_str(), ctx);
00257                 if (obj == NULL) {
00258                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to parse XPath " << xpath);
00259                 }
00260                 if (obj->nodesetval &&
00261                                 obj->nodesetval->nodeNr >= 1 &&
00262                                 obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[0] &&
00263                                 obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[0]->type == XML_ATTRIBUTE_NODE &&
00264                                 obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[0]->children) {
00265                         xmlChar* val = new xmlChar(value.length());
00266                         strcpy((char*)val, value.c_str());
00267                         obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[0]->children->content = val;
00268                 } else {
00269                         MT_LOGDEBUG("Failed to set string value");
00270                 }
00271     xmlXPathFreeObject(obj);
00272     xmlXPathFreeContext(ctx);
00273                 return 0;
00274         }

00276         ConfigList XmlConfig::getConfigs( const std::string xpath) const {
00277                 ConfigList cl;
00278 
00279                 if (!m_parsedDoc) {
00280                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to get configs: empty document");
00281                 }
00282                 xmlXPathContextPtr ctx = xmlXPathNewContext(m_parsedDoc);
00283                 if (ctx == NULL) {
00284                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to initialize XPath context");
00285                 }
00286                 ctx->node = m_parsedDoc->children;
00287                 xmlXPathObjectPtr obj = xmlXPathEvalExpression((const xmlChar*)xpath.c_str(), ctx);
00288                 if (obj == NULL) {
00289                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Failed to parse XPath " << xpath);
00290                 }
00291                 if (obj->nodesetval) {
00292                         for (int32_t i = 0; i < obj->nodesetval->nodeNr; i++) {
00293                                 cl.push_back(new XmlConfig(obj->nodesetval->nodeTab[i], m_lastChangeTime));
00294                         }
00295                 }
00296                 xmlXPathFreeObject(obj);
00297                 xmlXPathFreeContext(ctx);
00298                 return cl;
00299         }
00300 
00301         XmlConfigPtr  XmlConfig::getConfig( const std::string xpath) const {
00302                 ConfigList configs = getConfigs(xpath);
00303                 return (configs.empty()) ? XmlConfigPtr() : configs.front();
00304         }

00311         std::string XmlConfig::getName() const {
00312                 if (m_parsedDoc && m_parsedDoc->children) {
00313                         return std::string((char*)m_parsedDoc->children->name);
00314                 } else {
00315                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::XmlException, "Empty XML document.");
00316                 }
00317                 return std::string();
00318         }

00320         void XmlConfig::setModificationTime() {
00321                 //Getting file's modification time
00322                 struct stat st;
00323                 stat(m_fileName.c_str(), &st);
00324                 m_lastChangeTime = st.st_mtime;
00325         }
